thread.title: In London for a show
thread.title_full: In London for a show - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 110worldtraveller
title: In London for a show
text: Great value, brilliantly located hotel (show in theatre area finished just after 10pm and we were back in the hotel before 11pm). Rooms were spacious, modern and clean. Had breakfast in the hotel one morning which was lovely. Fabulous, friendly staff! Was there on Mothers Day and they were offering chocolates and bucks fizz in the morning - a lovely touch. Lots of amenities near by.
